Print your own custom designed invoice using this standard html template laid out with documented css. Download the file, make your changes and print with Firefox or other css compliant browser. Make sure to remove the margins, headers and footers and select Shrink To Fit. If you have trouble contact software@datavirtue.com for help. This file is free to use with no restrictions, it is under a Public domain license. This is a great file for web design students since it has a little of everything yet is still simple and easy to follow. This layout is done with embedded CSS using strict xHTML. With print in mind, all elements are laid out in points using absolute positioning.

When you try to print, this box will be hidden.
